title: The Awakening
text: The Awakening was a cataclysmic event that introduced magic to the world. It began with the appearance of the first rifts.

title: The Lost Civilization
text: Before the current era, a civilization known as the Aethel thrived. They were masters of Confluence magic.

title: Basics of Magic
text: Magic is manipulated through Essences. Every mage begins with three Base Essences which eventually form a Confluence.

title: Monsters
text: Monsters are creatures corrupted by chaotic mana. They are ranked similarly to Awakened individuals.
